snippet: Opening a two-day swing across Colorado, the president focused on the benefits of his health-care law for women and families, and reopened a debate over contraception.
abstract: Opening a two-day swing across Colorado, the president focused on the benefits of his health-care law for women and families, and reopened a debate over contraception.

headline.main: Obama Says Romney Would Take Women Back to 1950s on Health Care

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
